node.excerpt: Our ability to solve problems and our fear exist in inverse proportion – the more fear we experience, the less able we are to solve problems…

frontmatter.title: Fear and good problem solving are mutually exclusive
frontmatter.description: In which a humble video game illustrates a fundamental truth of learning

node.excerpt: This is part one of a series adapted from a talk me and Reetta gave internally at the Guardian, and then later at Continuous Lifecycle…
